alert.note: Alert for Jackson County Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and western Larimer Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 320 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers producing wind gusts to 55 mph along a line extending from 7 miles west of Tie Siding to 6 miles southeast of Rand, or along a line extending from 18 miles south of Laramie to 76 miles northwest of Denver. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trail Ridge, Kinikinik, Chambers Lake, Rand, Cameron Pass, Four Corners, Red Feather Lakes, Gould, Rustic, Cherokee Park, and Glendevey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds and near lakes should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Jackson County Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
